```{r}
data(trees, envir=environment())
x <- read.csv(DataPackageR::project_extdata_path("x.csv"))
trees <-
  merge(
    cbind(trees, data.frame(y = letters[seq_len(nrow(trees))])),
    x,
    all.x = T
  )
```
